location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 40 to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter discusses various departures and arrivals and adminstrative matters including sales of wool. The letter also notes that a member of the Factory guard will return to India due to ill-health and that a manifest of tearls and treasure shipped on board the BombayGrab was enclosed with it (it is not included in the file).
